https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6PORF8ervLTX0XKeLa4sVKyjQA4.jpg A small town news team discovers a box of video tapes where a faceless figure dressed in a dark suit, haunts and torments a family...slowly driving them insane. Soon after, they realize that the "Operator" has begun to stalk them as well. Always Watching: A Marble Hornets Story
